samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: The sample demonstrates the default functionalities of the Toolbar component (alternate to Ribbon component) which place commands with the scrollable mode.

samples.name: Popup
samples.description: The sample exposes popup mode of Toolbar component which configures overflowing toolbar commands (excessive items) inside a popup based on priority.

samples.name: Alignment
samples.description: This sample demonstrates how to align commands in left, right and center position in Toolbar component. The commands can be customized HTML template.
